channel.title: PKing
channel.description:
I find it not fun anymore. I used to have a blast pking, but now its just shit, lets face it.
Currently i have a 82 str/90 range/94 mage pure, and its not fun at all to pk. I don't know why but pking on private servers are much more fun.
Discuss.

item.title: PKing
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:18, topic:388911”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=484729.msg3552829#msg3552829 date=1301657178]
Claws, ags, vls etc etc etc ruin everything. Honestly, what’s the point in hitting two times to get a 99? The only solution to this dilemma is to add more overpowered weapons!
[/quote]

I dont mind godswords, but vesta longsword, curse prayers, chaotic, claws, ect, its just not fun as it once was.[/quote]
Actually you’re right, Godswords aren’t very overpowered compared to the other stuff that’s been released. Also overload pots…

Read full topic

item.title: PKing
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:7, topic:388911”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=484729.msg3552166#msg3552166 date=1301615211]
People started getting smart, and knew tanks would rape a pure.
[/quote]

Ill make a pure you make a tank and ill rape that shit any day.[/quote]

I have a tank. Bring it.

Read full topic

item.title: PKing
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:12, topic:388911”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=484729.msg3552379#msg3552379 date=1301622246]

Anything with the word any god name or claw or anything from quests/dungeoneering should be restricted to outside the wilderness. This leaves dragon, abyssal, and barrows to be used in the wilderness

Sounds boring…

Then you’ve never had the thrill of RuneScape classic pking, rune full pking, or dds/dscim or dds/whip combo pking.

Honestly, what “thrill” comes from rushing a person hitting half/all their health in one hit or one special bar?
[/quote]
Lol… don’t even start with saying I haven’t played RSC. I’ve been playing RS since 2003 and was playing the RSC private servers here for about 2-3 years but recently stopped being involved with all that due to the lack of maturity in that community. I get more of a thrill from clawing someone out than I did pking on RSC but thats just me. Btw many people still do dds/whip pk me being one. Also rushers are just a small percent of the pkers (if you could call them that) out there.[/quote]

And they are the most “popular” downers of the RuneScape community.

Read full topic

item.title: PKing
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Well before the update that removed the wild there weren’t items that could hit above 50 at a consistent rate. Ancient magic was the most widely used magic and barrows was the best armor. All of that has long since changed because they were aiming to make the game PvM not PvP and if the game is PvM then all weapons and magic could be overpowered.

After they changed the game back to PvP they should have nerfed a lot of the new items to ensure that the wilderness would be the same as before.

Read full topic

item.title: PKing
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

asyo4:

How is it shit? It was the same as before, wasn’t it?

Claws? Curses? New foods.

[quote=“nacional, post:4, topic:388911”]i see what you did there ^^^

also I don’t find it fun either, bunch of def noobs anywhere wtf. Jagex should make it
where pures rule wildy again.[/quote]

Jagex didn’t “make” it so they could rule the wildy. People started getting smart, and knew tanks would rape a pure.

Read full topic
